overview: With Jean-Baptiste at the front, Louise takes care of Bébé with the help of Uncle Pierre.  The letters she receives from Jean-Baptiste worry her, but Pierre distracts Bébé with a box of tin soldiers.  That night, Bébé has a dream of his soldiers vanquishing the enemy, and the next morning, Jean-Baptiste surprises the family by returning home.
title: The Little Tin Soldiers
